name: BackDoor- Door 2
description:
Taking the offer of a mysterious person on the phone, you now find yourself navigating the winding paths of a strange, empty otherworld. These paths soon take you to a new world filled with danger, robots, and a job with intentions that are yet to be known.

Controls are listed by mousing over the controller symbol on the top right corner of the game. They can also be configured from the main menu (under Options).

A walkthrough for the game can be found here: http://solarvagrant.tumblr.com/post/153933620578/d...
